translations: n.[电子]麦克风（microphone 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Their remarks were picked up by the hidden microphones.
sentences.translation: 他们的话被暗藏的麦克风传了出去。

sentences.sentence: Somebody forgot to bring along the U-bolts to clamp the microphones to the pole.
sentences.translation: 有人忘记带来把麦克风夹在支杆上的U型螺栓。

sentences.sentence: The only thing left to do is set up the microphones and speakers.
sentences.translation: 剩下唯一要做的事就是安装麦克风和扬声器。
